directions.text: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat.
Toss chicken with some salt and pepper.
Cook chicken skin down for 18 mins.
Flip chicken over and cook for another 8 mins, then set chicken aside.
In a small bowl whisk the rest of the ingredients in along with another pinch of salt and pepper.
Pour fat from skillet and cook sauce for 2 mins.
Serve by drizzling sauce over chicken.
